name: ModBot (Diet Games)
description:
Team up with an AI companion to control a droid in this dungeoncrawler rougelite! Delve deeper and deeper into hostile territory in your quest to sink the Mothership and reach glory!  Fight of wacky robots, tiny aliens in giant space suits and... a roomba with a knife? Modify and upgrade your bot inbetween runs with weapons and gadgets galore!

ModBot is an action/strategy dungeoncrawler rougelite where the player is in charge of movement and an AI is in charge of the weapons. Upgrade your droid inbetween runs to reach further into the mothership in your next run. The game is fully voiced, and has original Music, Art and Programming. 

Playing with sound turned on is highly recommended since the tutorial uses sounds to teach you key elements of the game. Don't progress through the tutorial too quickly since that will make the voicelines overlap each other which in return make them impossible to understand ;)

Made for Wowie Jam 4.0

Hope You Enjoy!
